name: U need to die!
description:
Synopsis: You're are a necromancer and an evil golem stoled  your precious gigantic banana and now you want it back. Can you bring it back? One thing is for sure, you will need to die, so you can come stronger.

How to Play:

WASD - MOVEMENT

arrow keys - TO SHOT

R - to Restart level

This game was supposed to be submission for the GameDev.Tv game jam, but I missed the deadline.

Packages used:

A* pathfinder
